definition: to return to the topic (idiom)/to get back to the main point
words/speech/to say/to talk
surname Gui

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
biography/historical narrative/commentaries/relay station

sentences.english: But back to the point. I had some money but not lots of money.
sentences.chinese: 言归正传吧，我有了一些钱，但是没有很多钱。

sentences.english: We can talk about you idea later, but now lets get back to our muttons .
sentences.chinese: 我们以后再谈你的点子，现在咱们言归正传。

sentences.english: But let's say we wanted to calculate the energy.
sentences.chinese: 言归正传，我们要计算他的能量。

sentences.english: Now: I am here to teach the girl-cub to talk.
sentences.chinese: 言归正传，我是来教那个小姑娘说话的。

sentences.english: Joking aside, my father also noticed another interesting facet to the evening.
sentences.chinese: 言归正传，家父也发现了有趣的另一面。

sentences.english: Back to the story, Recently, a lot of restaurants opens in Kepong.
sentences.chinese: 言归正传，最近真的很多食店在Kepong开档了。

sentences.english: Jane: Tom....Let's get to the point! Where have you been last night?
sentences.chinese: 汤姆，让我们言归正传，昨晚你上哪了？

sentences.english: After the jump, we present the top five ways to create an earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 言归正传，我们展示了五种制造地震的方法。

sentences.english: To talk idly, especially to gossip.
So, would the Chinese government shut down Sina Weibo?
sentences.chinese: 言归正传，中国政府会关掉新浪微博吗？

definition: to say sth
to digress/to get sidetracked/to go off on a tangent
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
(onom.) smack!
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
as for/when it comes to
today/at the present/now
editor or creator of online content (diminutive term, often used to refer to oneself: I, me, this writer)
sentence-final particle, contraction of 了啊, indicating exclamation/particle placed after each item in a list of examples
(onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc/(phonetic)/(dialect) to chat
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
everyone/influential family/great expert
(phonetic)
to cough up/also pr. [ka3]
(final particle similar to 了[le5], indicating that sth is obvious)
to talk about/to mention/(preposition) as for
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
a Pekinese/a pug/(dialect) to scold
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
(onom.) laughing out loud
subordinates in gang of bandits
